'''Descendants of Ahkantenal''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Land of Tleyaoyotl]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 131]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''[https://sacred-texts.com/nam/maya/cbc/cbc27.htm#fr_858 Ah Kantenal]'', meaning "he of the yellow tree place," is an unknown being mentioned in {{w|Chilam Balam|The Books of Chilam Balam}}, the sacred books of the Maya of Yucatán. Possibly an alternative name for {{w|Chaac}}, the Maya god of rain, thunder, and lightning.
